items.sentence: I can\'t believe that the pizza still isn\'t done.
I can\'t go with you today because I\'m very busy.

Tom guessed that Mary was around thirty years old.
Tom had bruises all over his body after the fight.
Tom had dreams of becoming a famous tennis player.
Tom had never seen such a beautiful garden before.
Tom had to borrow money from Mary to pay his rent.
Tom said he wanted to get out of town for a while.
Tom seems to have fallen into some kind of a coma.
I\'d like to know why you weren\'t here yesterday.
We won\'t be hearing from Tom for quite some time.
Tom didn\'t have to tell me, but I\'m glad he did.
